where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ord_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cashier_id = #{cashierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cashier_name = #{cashierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_mobile = #{clientMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_order_number = #{subOrderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_number = #{useNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dest_number = #{destNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_channel = #{orderChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, airport_code = #{airportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ool.order_id, oo.order_no, oo.create_time, oo.client_id, oo.client_name, oo.client_mobile, oo.enterprise_id, oo.store_id, oo.order_status, oo.pay_status, oo.dest_number, oo.use_number, oo.sub_order_number, oo.order_amount, oo.actual_amount, oo.pay_type, oo.pay_no, oo.pay_time, ool.enterprise_name, ool.remarks, ool.store_remarks, ool.store_name, ob.bill_type, ob.company_name, ob.tax_number, ob.person_name, oso.product_id, oso.product_img, oso.product_number, oso.specification_id, oso.sub_order_id, oso.unit_price, oso.total_price, osol.product_name, osol.specification_name FROM ord_order oo JOIN ord_order_language ool ON ool.order_id = oo.order_id AND ool.language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ool.is_deleted = 0 JOIN ord_bill ob ON ob.order_id = oo.order_id AND ob.is_deleted = 0 JOIN ord_sub_order oso ON oso.order_id = oo.order_id AND oso.is_deleted = 0 JOIN ord_sub_order_language osol ON osol.sub_order_id = oso.sub_order_id AND osol.language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND osol.is_deleted = 0 WHERE oo.is_deleted = 0 and oo.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ool.order_id, oo.order_no, oo.create_time, oo.client_id, oo.client_name, oo.client_mobile, oo.enterprise_id, oo.store_id, oo.order_status, oo.pay_status, oo.dest_number, oo.use_number, oo.sub_order_number, oo.order_amount, oo.actual_amount, oo.pay_type, oo.pay_no, oo.pay_time, ool.enterprise_name, ool.remarks, ool.store_remarks, ool.store_name, ob.bill_type, ob.company_name, ob.tax_number, ob.person_name, oso.product_id, oso.product_img, oso.product_number, oso.specification_id, oso.sub_order_id, oso.unit_price, oso.total_price, osol.product_name, osol.specification_name FROM ord_order oo JOIN ord_order_language ool ON ool.order_id = oo.order_id AND ool.language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ool.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ord_bill ob ON ob.order_id = oo.order_id AND ob.is_deleted = 0 JOIN ord_sub_order oso ON oso.order_id = oo.order_id AND oso.is_deleted = 0 JOIN ord_sub_order_language osol ON osol.sub_order_id = oso.sub_order_id AND osol.language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND osol.is_deleted = 0 WHERE oo.is_deleted = 0 and oo.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
